about_the_game:
The Hip to be Blob DLC contains the following:

Unlocks Emika Bikini Costume
(needs to be bought with LewdCoins)
1 Million Gold
50 000 Purpstige
10 000 Purple Matter
500 Flowers (Dating Gift)
100 Blue Globbloppers
100 Red Globbloppers
100 Yellow Globbloppers
100 Green Globbloppers
2000 LewdCoins

- Starts the HiptobeBlob Generator in the Lab.
- Reduces Blob laser cooldown to 10min from 30min.

DLC can be claimed in-game once bought. Please restart the game if you are not able to claim it.
DLC can be claimed once per savegame. You can claim it again if you start a new save game or reset your game.

Thank you for your support!

short_description: Hip to be Blob DLC unlocks the ability to get Emika naked, along with cosmetics for the blob and a ton of resources.
